title: Proboscis
creator_credit: Rebecca McLean, Hugh Burton and Victorian College of the Arts
brief_description: Penny Gosonski and her family had an accident on their way to their holiday destination. Apart from her father’s death, the worst fate Penny had to face was the loneliness of being the sole heir to the family’s attribute. A large nose that could send a thousand balloons into flight. Cast includes Julia Fernandez, Bree-Anna Obst and Phillipa Hagen.
